name: mssql-dxt
description: A Desktop Extension to interact with Microsoft SQL Server, supporting multiple connections via a JSON configuration.

connections_json.title: Connections JSON
connections_json.description: Enter a JSON string representing an array of connection objects. Each object must define 'name', 'server', 'port', 'database', 'auth_method', 'driver', and optionally 'username', 'password', 'trust_cert'. Example: [{"name":"dev","server":"localhost","port":1433,"database":"mydb","auth_method":"sql_server_authentication","username":"sa","password":"yourpassword","driver":"ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server","trust_cert":false}]

tools.name: list_configured_connections
tools.description: Lists the names of all configured MSSQL connections from the Connections JSON.

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Executes a SQL query against a specified MSSQL connection.

tools.name: list_databases
tools.description: Lists all databases on a specified MSSQL server instance.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Lists all tables in the current/specified database on a specified MSSQL connection.

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Gets the schema (columns, types) for a specified table on a specified MSSQL connection.
